scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && sleep 10 && cd ../example && npm install babylon-msdf-text@latest
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish && sleep 10 && cd ../example && npm install babylon-msdf-text@latest
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish && sleep 10 && cd ../example && npm install babylon-msdf-text@latest
